item.title: Vekllei
item.description: Overview # ß· This article is about Vekllei Vekllei is a utopia and superstate in the Atlantic Ocean, which means it is social dream that explores new systems of living through a flexible alternate history. Set ostensibly in Iceland, the history and geography of Vekllei is radically different from our own. It is also the home of all of Vekllei’s major characters. The Commonwealth of Vekllei, commonly Vekllei, is a supranational commonwealth of constituent countries1 bound closely together by shared geographic and political features.
